column4: Welcome, you are now talking to an AI doctor. As I am part of a scientific experiment, I would appreciate it if you could take the time to answer a super short questionnaire at the end of the interview. Tap Speak to ask your question and then tap Send to submit it to me.
hello hello you may not know this but i'm an alien my tummy hurts and it turns yellow instead of green what's my problem

It sounds like you may be experiencing gastrointestinal issues. It is difficult to diagnose without a physical examination, but some symptoms of abdominal discomfort can include abdominal pain, gas, bloating, and changes in bowel movements. The yellow color may indicate that you are experiencing a medical condition known as jaundice. It is important that you seek an evaluation from an experienced physician who can investigate the cause of your abdominal discomfort and advise you on a suitable treatment plan.

I apologize if my response was unsatisfactory. It is important to me that you feel heard and supported. Please consider seeking medical advice from an experienced medical professional as soon as possible.
yeah so i think my dog just threw up on the floor

It sounds like your dog may be experiencing an illness or upset stomach. Since I cannot confirm the cause of the vomiting without a physical examination, it is important that you contact your veterinarian or bring your dog in for an examination as soon as possible. They can provide additional assistance in determining the cause of the vomiting and the best course of action to take.
